Hello :)

I've been quiet for almost a year, but things have been super busy for BunnyCDN. As usual for Black Friday, we're currently giving a 25% recharge bonus for one payment on Black Friday, but we also prepared a special LET promo code for $6 account credits with no payment required as a thank you for the love. This works either for new or old accounts. You can find the code at the bottom of the post.

Since I haven't posted much for a while, I also wanted to share some of the cool new stuff we've added recently.

**Edge Storage - Geo-Replicated Cloud Storage**
 We recently released our new Geo-Replicated system that allows you to store and automatically replicate files on the edge over 5 locations. This offers unparalleled storage performance for global content delivery, and we're super excited about it.

**Perma-Cache**
With the Edge Storage, we also released a new Perma-Cache system, that permanently stores cached files in the edge storage. This results in great performance even for cache MISS requests and I think it's an amazing solution for smaller sites.

**High Volume Updates**
We also included Singapore into our High Volume tier to further boost the High Volume tier performance.

We have much more coming soon, so it's a very exciting time for us.

<br /><br /><br />
![](https://bunnycdn.com/assets/v2/images/bunnycdn-logo-dark.svg "")

At BunnyCDN, we are trying to constantly push the boundaries of performance while offering really cost-effective pricing and innovative features. We offer two pricing tiers aimed at different requirements. Both are 100% Pay As You Go with a $10/year minimum payment.

**Standard Tier** (43 POPs, any region can also be toggled on/off)
- $0.010/GB for Europe & North America
- $0.030/GB for Asia & Oceania
- $0.045/GB for South America
- $0.060/GB for South Africa

**High Volume Tier** (8 POPs)
$5/TB global rate and as low as $2.5/TB after 2PB/month

Enabled pops: Amsterdam, Frankfurt, Paris, Dallas, Los Angeles, Miami, Chicago, Singapore

_There is a $1 per month minimum usage, but the credit is valid for the life of the account._

**Some of our features:**

- 30Tbps+ network backbone
- 100% SSD/NVMe hardware
- 43 PoPs
- Perma-Cache
- Edge Storage
- Image Processing
- Free SSL for custom hostnames with Let's Encrypt integration
- HTTP/2
- Brotli
- Edge Rules
- Origin Shield
- Toggle any region ON/OFF
- Secure URL tokens
- HTTP Video delivery
- 95% Average Cache HIT rate
- Instant setup with a super simple control panel
- Friendly team and a cute name :)
- CDN accelerated cloud storage ($0.01/GB of storage)
- Block IPs, countries
- Hotlinking protection
- 99.99%+ Uptime guarantee
[- And lots more :)](https://bunnycdn.com/features "- And lots more :)")

**Our Network**
We now have 43 PoPs over 6 continents + quite a few more that will be announced soon ;)

![](https://publicshare.b-cdn.net/let/network-list-2.png "")


# Promo code: LETFRIDAY-2020

**You can enter the code in the billing section of your account after setting up your account details (name and address) and it's valid for the next 3 days.** 

For more info, you can have a look at https://bunnycdn.com
<br />
We've grown a lot over the past few years and have just recently hit 10.000 customers. The early growth was largely thanks to LET, so I wanted to take this opportunity to say thank you for helping us get where we are today!

Happy Black Friday / Thanksgiving! :)<br />
